Class MedicalRecordController

java.lang.Object
controller.MedicalRecordController
public class MedicalRecordController extends Object
The MedicalRecordController class manages the medical records and user information for patients in the hospital management system. It provides functionalities to update patient contact information, diagnoses, prescriptions, and treatments, as well as saving the updated records to files.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    medicalRecordFilePath
    The file path for saving medical records.
    private Map<String,MedicalRecord>
    medicalRecords
    A map that stores medical records, keyed by patient ID.
    private Scanner
    scanner
    A Scanner object for reading user input.
    private String
    userFilePath
    The file path for saving user records.
    private Map<String,User>
    users
    A map that stores user information, keyed by user ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecordController

      public MedicalRecordController(Map<String,MedicalRecord> medicalRecords, Map<String,User> users, String medicalRecordFilePath, String userFilePath)
      Constructs a MedicalRecordController with the specified medical records, users, and file paths for medical records and user records.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecords - A map of medical records keyed by patient ID.
      users - A map of user information keyed by user ID.
      medicalRecordFilePath - The file path for saving medical records.
      userFilePath - The file path for saving user records.

      patientId - The ID of the patient whose contact email is to be updated.

    • isPatientIdValid

      public boolean isPatientIdValid(String patientId)
      Validates if the provided patient ID exists in both users and medical records.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the patient ID is valid; false otherwise.
